summary: B2B corporate website with industry-specific pages that require per-industry color themes and a clean modern corporate design.
architectural_notes: Industry pages should support theming: primary color for buttons/highlights/icons; optional accent color for secondary highlights; background color for page/hero background.
Logo is not uploaded yet; implement a temporary placeholder/text logo approach that can be swapped when the logo is provided.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Clean corporate wordmark logo on transparent background (logo-wordmark-updated.dim_600x160.png)

existing_features.title: Implement the provided per-industry color schemes on all industry-specific pages so that each page uses its industry background color for the top hero/banner section and uses the industry primary color for key highlights (e.g., page title accent, section headings, links, icon accents) while maintaining a clean, modern corporate B2B look.

Add a centralized, explicit mapping from industry page IDs to their theme tokens (primary_color, optional accent_color, background_color) and ensure the mapping keys align with existing industry page IDs used by routing and content (e.g., corporate-enterprise, education, healthcare, manufacturing, government, hospitality, banking, training-centers, retail, live-events).

Handle the missing/unuploaded logo gracefully across the header and footer by adding a robust fallback when the configured logo image cannot be loaded (e.g., swap to a text-based brand mark using BRAND.name or a locally-generated placeholder logo asset) without breaking layout in desktop or mobile navigation.
Add (or regenerate) a clean corporate wordmark placeholder logo image matching the existing configured logo path so the site has a consistent logo until the real logo is uploaded.

new_feature_requests.summary: Apply provided per-industry color schemes (primary/accent/background) to industry-specific pages with a clean modern B2B corporate design.
Handle missing logo asset (use placeholder or text-based logo styling until logo is uploaded).

projectName: Apply per-industry color themes and add a safe fallback for missing logo
